description: Lists all the mobile device access overrides for any given combination of WorkMail organization, user, or device.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization under which to list mobile device access overrides.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The WorkMail user under which you list the mobile device access overrides. Accepts the following types of user identities: User ID: 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 or S-1-1-12-1234567890-123456789-123456789-1234 Email address: user@domain.tld User name: user.

nested_items.name: Overrides
nested_items.description: The list of mobile device access overrides that exist for the specified WorkMail organization and user.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: The WorkMail user to which the access override applies.

nested_items.name: DeviceId
nested_items.description: The device to which the override applies.

nested_items.name: Effect
nested_items.description: The effect of the override, ALLOW or DENY.

nested_items.name: DateCreated
nested_items.description: The date the override was first created.

nested_items.name: DateModified
nested_items.description: The date the override was last modified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. The value is 'null' when there are no more results to return.
